    OpenWeatherMap Weather Forecast Plugin¶

    Contents:

    • TODOs
    • Juham OpenWeatherMap Plugin

    OpenWeatherMap forecast for Juham™¶

    Description¶

    Adds forecast support to Juham™ home automation.

    Project Status¶

    Current State: Pre-Alpha (Status 2)

    Please check out the CHANGELOG file for changes in this release.

    Getting Started¶

    ### Installation

    1. Install

    pip install juham_openweathermap

    1. Configure

    Create OpenWeatherMap.json configuration file in ~/.[yourapp]/config/ folder for Open Weathermap credentials.

    {
  "bucket": "OpenWeather",
  "appid": "[yourappid]",
  "location": "[yourlocation]",
  "url": "https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/forecast",
  "update_interval": 43200
}
